Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: The Eagle has landed

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: In much of society, research means to investigate something you do not know or understand

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: I am, and ever will be, a white socks, pocket protector, nerdy engineer

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Geologists have a saying - rocks remember

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: People love conspiracy theories

Quote.Author: Neil Armstrong
Quote.QuoteValue: Houston, Tranquillity Base here. The Eagle has landed

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on a merry-go-round, you miss a lot of the scenery

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: It's very difficult for me to say 'I love you' but to sing 'I love you' for me is easier

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: Performing is the easiest part of what I do, and songwriting is the hardest

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: I think probably Australians have just a little more taste than most people

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: Song Sung Blue took a lot of compressing and refining, and it has one of my favorite lyrics

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: Songs are life in 80 words or less

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky. Hard work is the key, but luck plays a part

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like all of the music to be serious and deadly

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a mystery to writing, and you don't really know where most of it comes from

Quote.Author: Neil Diamond
Quote.QuoteValue: I still need practice in enjoying the fruits of success

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: The Parthenon without the marbles is like a smile with a tooth missing

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: Loyalty is a fine quality, but in excess it fills political graveyards

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: The unforgivable political sin is vanity; the killer diet is sour grapes

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: In the U.K. the far Right is a stain on society and there is a cultural resistance to it

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the guy everybody wanted to live next door. They just didn't want me to be prime minister

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot fashion a wit out of two half-wits

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: Do something that makes a difference - because, by God, there's a lot to make you angry

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: I would die for my country but I could never let my country die for me

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: Newspapers are tutors as well as informers

Quote.Author: Neil Kinnock
Quote.QuoteValue: The enemy of idealism is zealotry

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: In a relationship you have to open yourself up

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a story

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: My best male friend is my best friend until he crosses me. We're all protective of the self

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody has the ability to be manipulative, to be hateful and deceitful

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: Unrequited love is always a great thing

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: We humans are a fairly barbarous bunch

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a little bit of Howard and Chad in them. I think there's Christine in all men as well

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a healthy view of what one can do with art

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: I make movies I want to see

Quote.Author: Neil LaBute
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to tell a story that interested me as much in the telling as in the watching

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought filet mignon was the steak to beat, but the fat content in a rib eye is fantastic

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: In my 20s, I mostly ate burritos and nachos, with the occasional burger

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Charlie Sheen is who again? Denise is engaged?

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I know where I'm going. And I like where I'm going

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an unbelievable assistant who handles all of my scheduling! It's like a Tetris game

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a nerdy, geeky fan of' Labyrinth' and 'Dark Crystal'

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy being a hyphenate. I've always thought of my career as a plate spinner in the circus

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the best cruise ship crooner. I'm not the best karaoke guy

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I think when dance is mediocre, it's painful. But when dance is really impressive, it destroys

Quote.Author: Neil Patrick Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not trying to climb a ladder - I'm casting a bit of a net

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, drum soloing is like doing a marathon and solving equations at the same time

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: If you choose not to decide, you still have made a choice

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've got a problem, take it out on a drum

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing a three-hour Rush show is like running a marathon while solving equations

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much attention and hoopla doesn't agree with my temperament

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: For a person of my sensibility, you're only left with the Democratic party

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: Stamina is the force that drives the drumming; it's not really a sprint

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: When Mr. Ludwig invented the bass-drum pedal, that's what made the drum set possible

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no blood in jazz drumming, and there are no bullies in jazz drumming

Quote.Author: Neil Peart
Quote.QuoteValue: Do yourself a favor. Don't ever say to me, 'Everything happens for a reason.'

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Earth is a flower and it's pollinating

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: It's cool to go places where working people are happy

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: As you go through life, you've got to see the valleys as well as the peaks

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Commitments are one of the worst things to have in the music business. They're very annoying

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I totally have no other talent and I would be totally out of work if I did anything else

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Rock and roll is here to stay

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I can get away with saying a lot of ideas that are young and naive. I'm liberated

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I could be likened to an old hound circling on a rug for the last five years

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about my music is, there really is no point

Quote.Author: Neil Young
Quote.QuoteValue: Something comes along and you have to jump on and do it. You can't stop until it's done

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, if I can survive marching band, I can survive anything

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is such a fleeting emotion. It's such a small part of the things you do in your life

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought I had a talent for alienating people, but I have no idea what it is that doesn't go over

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a side of me that identifies with Aileen Wuornos

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: I will say that art may well be the only thing that lasts, so I guess it's worth trying

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: I have trouble with any kind of focus or concentrating, or getting anything done at all, really

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: You can criticize something you strive for, and you can avoid something you dream about

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess you deal with what you get

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there are nice things about every era. I wish we could just take the nice things

Quote.Author: Nellie McKay
Quote.QuoteValue: The other kids wanted to play Destiny's Child, but I wanted Anita O'Day

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind anybody coming after me as long as they're coming with facts

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm on the board of any company where there's an offer that comes in, I want to negotiate

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Rupert Murdoch is a good friend of mine

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Before, Tiffany sold watches only in its own stores. Now, Tiffany watches are sold in 1,500 stores

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what term you don't hear anymore? Arbitrage. The markets have gotten too efficient

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: Sequestration, sequestation - however you pronounce that word - and gridlock aren't all that bad

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I love women

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm willing to have two directors on the DuPont board, me being one of them

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: The name 'Mondelez' I hate. It sounds like a disease

Quote.Author: Nelson Peltz
Quote.QuoteValue: You must make some decisions Wall Street dislikes

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm allergic to doing the obvious thing

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm 50. And I'm not ever really worried about being trendy

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to make God happy, tell him your plans

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: My daughters are my Picassos

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: Who needs a handbag? I put my money in my bra

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not super-ambitious. I am not a classically amazing singer or anything

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone in Sweden has great hair and teeth and is clean-cut and organised

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: I always found very strong images for my songwriting in New York

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a bit of a rebel, and I always will be

Quote.Author: Neneh Cherry
Quote.QuoteValue: Frank Ocean is our modern-day Marvin Gaye. In our house, we have nothing but respect for him

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't trust anybody with power

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not brave, you're not going to be free

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics and war are remarkably similar situations

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: You can never study Franklin Delano Roosevelt too much

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all human and we all goof. Do things that may be wrong, but do something

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: I discourage a cult of personality

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a natural leader. I'm too intellectual; I'm too abstract; I think too much

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: It is time we passed a balanced budget amendment and return this government to limited spending

Quote.Author: Newt Gingrich
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important social welfare program in America is a job

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: If you abandon the present moment, you cannot live the moments of your daily life deeply

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: In true dialogue, both sides are willing to change

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Many of us have been running all our lives. Practice stopping

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: One Buddha is not enough; we need to have many Buddhas

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the capacity to take care, to protect, to nourish

Quote.Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is the cessation of suffering

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: In many ways we are all sons and daughters of ancient Greece

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't temper how I feel. I'm Greek. I've got emotions

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: America was founded on immigrants. The immigrant experience is common to all of us

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are so many things. We're sisters, mothers, wives. There are so many things we encompass

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no idea how to use social media for anything other than forwarding a good fart joke

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't work that much because I am selective

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: You're never too fat for a new purse

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd been raised by my parents who taught me not to think you're better than you are

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't card out my screenplays ever. I just have an idea I just sit down and write I don't edit

Quote.Author: Nia Vardalos
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't get an acting job to save my life when I moved to L.A

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone told me the smile on my face gets bigger when I play the guitar

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I just like sitting at home, chilling and watching a movie

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel I am a little bit older. Reckon I will start growing a beard next week

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather be a kid and play with paper planes, than be a man and play with a woman's heart

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to live up to how people expect me to be

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a flirt; I just try to be myself

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've not actually been on too many dates

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an emotional guy, so I don't have to worry about a girl trying to get me to open up

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: Fans always tell me I'm beautiful, but no one will ever be as beautiful as them

Quote.Author: Niall Horan
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone gets that second album syndrome

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in the television show 'True Detective' was plagiarized

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever story you're telling in Louisiana, the landscape is going to become a character in it

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: If I write scripts that nobody likes, I don't think we'll be doing 'True Detective.'

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised by television. It was my first cultural window. It was a constant companion

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: Art was always for me an escape and a way to relate to the world around me

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to not have a reputation than a bad one

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think you can create effectively toward expectation. I'm not in the service business

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: I was raised in a heavily Catholic family. Early and consistent encounters with mysticism

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't come to Hollywood to be subservient to anyone else's vision

Quote.Author: Nic Pizzolatto
Quote.QuoteValue: Killing characters on television has become an easy short cut to cathartic emotion

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: A little bit of attention can go a long way

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: Just a little help, a small security force, a bit of food, can save lives

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to invade a place or install a new government to help bring about a positive change

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: The conflict in Darfur could escalate to where we're seeing 100,000 victims per month

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: You will be judged in years to come by how you responded to genocide on your watch

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's dangerous to be optimistic. Things could go terribly wrong virtually overnight

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: I have often tried to tell the story of a place through people there

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: The bulk of the emails tend to come after a column. I can get about 2,000 after a column

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to keep issuing blame to Republicans or the president

Quote.Author: Nicholas D. Kristof
Quote.QuoteValue: Neither left nor right has focused adequately on maternal health

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really have disappointments, because I build myself up for rejection

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I can be a bit grumpy. I'm full of angst, and hormones

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like to keep busy, otherwise my brain starts ticking

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: Long-term boredom can't lead to anything good

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to share my worries - that's for me to know

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: Life's too short for regrets

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not scared of growing up, but it just happens, doesn't it?

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're out, and starving, and need a bite to eat, then you need fast food

Quote.Author: Nicholas Hoult
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't eat veal, and my mum won't eat lamb, because she thinks it's a bit harsh to eat cute things

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I suppose I'm most influenced by any good, commercial writer. I learn from everyone

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Loving once and only once is possible - anything is possible

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm writing a new love story, set in eastern North Carolina. Surprise, surprise, huh?

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not use profanity in my novels. My characters all go to church

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look for me, I'm in the fiction section. Romance has its own section

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Spreading the news is your duty as a Christian, and there are many ways to do this

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Rekindled love is generally short-term

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: Over time, quality work will lead to an audience for your work

Quote.Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't write romance novels

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, a forever love is a bond that can't be broken

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Saturday morning, you knew what was cool by what was on 'Soul Train.'

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I was 16 years old, driving to LA, and sleeping in my car, just trying to make it happen

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: My Vocation is my Vacation. I love what I do

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Right now, I'm as single as a slice of American cheese

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: People have always said I have an old soul, and all my best friends are 10 to 15 years my senior

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always try to be optimistic, but not to the point where I'm getting on people's nerves

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I was rapping at eight

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so into playing different characters, even when I was on Nickelodeon. I just observe

Quote.Author: Nick Cannon
Quote.QuoteValue: Me personally, I wouldn't put my kids on television. But to each his own

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: A gentleman never talks about his tailor

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Inspiration' is a word used by people who aren't really doing anything

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: Texting is apocalyptic on some level. It's a reduction of things

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always a pleasure on a personal note for me to come back to Australia

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: Film seems to be a medium designed for betrayal and violence

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: People think I'm a miserable sod but it's only because I get asked such bloody miserable questions

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: Kylie Minogue is the greatest thing that has happened to Australian music

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: If you took love out of the equation, I wouldn't know what else to write about

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: The blues is instilled in every musical cell that floats around your body

Quote.Author: Nick Cave
Quote.QuoteValue: I write hate lyrics really well. It's not every day you can use them, really

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: The end doesn't justify anything, because all we ever live with is the means

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Names aren't just coathooks, they're coats. They're the first thing anyone knows about you

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Digitisation was supposed to lead to a great democratisation of access to creative work

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge is not just power - it is control

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: The great thing is to have been surrounded by stories all my life

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: My reading of history is that we continually inherit trouble

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fascinated by human agency - by the process of decision, both in the individual and the mass

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an avid reader of comics, though I came to them late

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: The mainstream of literary culture in the U.K. is very averse to writing about technology

Quote.Author: Nick Harkaway
Quote.QuoteValue: Amazon makes money differently from a conventional publisher. It is an infrastructure player

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep my political views to myself

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I love pizza; you can't really go wrong with pizza

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: It doesn't matter if the world is pulling you down. With Christ, you have everything

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not one of these Disney haters. I'm really appreciative of the foundation it laid for me

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have studied English, but I really don't like to read

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my favorite song from another artist would have to be 'Superstition' by Stevie Wonder

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I am who I am, and I can't change that. It's not something I've labored over

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been quite driven. I take after my father

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the show 'Nashville,' I mean, that's a show that's pretty incredible

Quote.Author: Nick Jonas
Quote.QuoteValue: The tricky thing is, from what I've heard, I'm a bit emotionally unavailable

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been all that comfortable in real life

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: You give up your narcissism, your egotism. That's how you achieve chemistry

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a good sewer. My mother taught me how to sew

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: American society is still puritanical

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: Asking for forgiveness is just one of the most painful kind of experiences

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: Living in a small town, one of the keys to survival was your imagination

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: No one wants to spend too long inside their own darkness

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: Birth is violent, and out of that violence is our only chance of rebirth

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: If you feel you have a film that's valid, you stick your ass on the line

Quote.Author: Nick Nolte
Quote.QuoteValue: I've made a lot of mistakes and I don't regret any of them. Sometimes that's the only way you learn

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: Mediocre people don't like high achievers, and high achievers don't like mediocre people

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to be the Alabama coach

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I always ask myself the question, do you like to win, or do you hate to lose?

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: It's never OK to lose a game

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there's a certain pride people have in competition

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a lot of times you have to face your fears. I think everybody has to face their fears

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I never want to discontinue giving kids opportunities

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the worst thing a player can do is just not be yourself

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife gets so mad at me because I don't like to cook on the grill

Quote.Author: Nick Saban
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a lot more success helping guys then just being punitive

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what the best thing about morning ski trips are? McDonald's!

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: On the road and traveling - that's when people are at their most creative

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: People use GoPros to capture the experiences they are passionate about

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll let myself obsess over things

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: Smartphones are always in your pocket. They're about reactive capture

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear drives you a lot harder than success does

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: A smartphone is a mobile computer in your pocket

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to fire somebody is to compassionately fire them

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: Losing other people's money was terrible

Quote.Author: Nick Woodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I wore a GoPro camera on my head for all three of my boys

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is beatable on the right day

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a 'comeback kid' - you can't keep me down for long!

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: I love shopping, but I only really have time to do it online

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I was always picky about food; if it didn't 'look right,' I wouldn't eat it

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing ever stops me smiling, apart from getting beat in the ring

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though I am a woman boxer, I am not just inspiring women; I hope I am inspiring boys as well

Quote.Author: Nicola Adams
Quote.QuoteValue: All I want is to keep boxing for Great Britain and inspire others
